abstract: JPMorgan’s management is trying to convince regulators and its own employees that the forced departure of Bill Winters as co-chief of the bank reduce the importance of its London operations, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: JPMorgan’s management is trying to convince regulators and its own employees that the forced departure of Bill Winters as co-chief of the bank reduce the importance of its London operations, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan‘s management is trying to convince regulators and its own employees that the forced departure of Bill Winters as co-chief of the bank would not reduce the importance of its London operations, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Reassure London Staff of Role

abstract: JPMorgan Chase is promoting Kurt Simon to co-lead its technology, media and telecommunications team, according to The Wall Street Journal.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is promoting Kurt Simon to co-lead its technology, media and telecommunications team, according to The Wall Street Journal.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is promoting Kurt Simon to co-lead its technology, media and telecommunications team, according to The Wall Street Journal.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Simon Said to Co-Head Tech Team
